Package com.cs546.backend.core

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
com.cs546.backend.core.GameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionListener, GameStateObserver
@Component
public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
implements ActionListener, GameStateObserver
Controller of the simulation. It manages both the AI agent and the city simulation.
